Description:Play Never Alone (Kisima Ingitchuna) introduces the ancient legends Inupiat and gives a unique gaming experience. Never Alone - this atmospheric puzzle-platformer for 1 or 2 igrokov.Sadis closer, and I'll tell you unipkaak - story handed to me from the past down through many generations. Many years ago it told me Nasruk. He said: "Listening to someone who wants to hear, shows great wisdom. Remember, if you are part of IÃƒÂ±upiaq people, you'll never be lonely. This is a story about Kunuuksayuka. The story of the endless blizzard threatens the destruction of our people. History of the dangerous journey to the icy edge of the world. The story of courage and true friendship. Play my story. You - a girl, and you - fox, you go on dangerous ground and look into the face of the horror of the ice. You'll meet fantastic creatures and see the Lost Village. You discover the secrets and beauty of spirit helpers, hidden in the world around us. Overcome with trials and obstacles violent nature. Alone can not survive. But together you can, if you wisely use the strengths of each other and not give up in the face of formidable north wind and snow. You can restore the balance on the ground. Otherwise we will lose everything.Features:Play for girl and fox at any time by switching between characters. Together they must overcome obstacles and solve puzzles - each of them has unique skills and abilities. The second player may at any time enter into a joint local game.
Explore dangerous expanse of the Arctic, from the tundra and coastal villages to the ice floes and mysterious forest. Get ready to meet with storm winds, blizzards and deceptive mountains.
Meet amazing heroes IÃƒÂ±upiaq folklore: a murderer, little people, spirit helpers, blizzard-Man and many others. Never Alone game to get reliable, it helped create the elders and storytellers Alaskan Native.
Listen to the story of Kunuuksayuka by the narrator of the Inupiat tribe in their native language - this has not happened in any video game.
Unlock special Video tour, recorded Inupiat community to touch their dedication, wisdom and life views..Features Repack:Do not cut / no recoded
